Another post page

Posted as an example, on Mar 28, 2018

Another simple page.

Since all post pages are tagged post they form a collection and can be easily inspected and iterated over. See that on the home page

This page is part of the posts section.

The code is maintained by Phil Hawksworth for his own reference and as a quick start for some of his projects, but take it if it is useful for you too. Find the repo on GitHub.
